section.title: tm.hash_stats
section.para: Prints hash table statistics (can be used only if tm is compiled with -DTM_HASH_STATS).

section.title: tm.t_uac_start
section.para: starts a tm uac using a list of string parameters: method, ruri, dst_uri, send_sock, headers (CRLF separated) and body (optional)

section.title: tm.t_uac_wait
section.para: starts a tm uac and waits for the final reply, using a list of string parameters: method, ruri, dst_uri send_sock, headers (CRLF separated) and body (optional)
